Metadata.title: DATAWISE | Data Science Consultancy
Metadata.description: Datawise helps companies transform data into strategic decisions. Data science, machine learning and AI solutions to optimize your business.
Metadata.ogDescription: We transform data into strategic decisions for your business

TopBanner.message: Only 5 spots remaining → reserve yours this month!

Hero.title: Partners in AI for your company
Hero.subtitle: We combine artificial intelligence and business knowledge to transform your company's data and processes into growth engines.

TransformBusiness.title: Transform Your Business
TransformBusiness.subtitle: Discover how our personalized solutions can boost your business efficiency and profitability.

productivity.title: Increase Productivity
productivity.description: Automate processes and reduce time spent on repetitive tasks, allowing your team to focus on what really matters.

decisions.title: Optimize Decisions
decisions.description: Transform data into actionable insights that enable smarter and more strategic decisions for your business.

costs.title: Reduce Costs
costs.description: Identify optimization areas and eliminate waste, increasing operational efficiency and maximizing return on investment.

Services.title: Services
Services.subtitle: Tailored solutions to optimize your operations and drive tangible results through data science and artificial intelligence.

items.title: Predictive Models
items.description: We develop models that anticipate trends and behaviors based on historical patterns, enabling proactive decisions: identification of customers at risk of churn, sales forecasting and preventive maintenance.

items.title: Competitive Intelligence and Media Monitoring
items.description: Automatic collection and analysis of information about competitors, market trends and public sentiment through continuous monitoring of digital sources for more informed decisions.

items.title: Workflow Automation
items.description: Development of automated systems that orchestrate complex processes, connecting different departments and applications to eliminate bottlenecks and ensure efficient and error-free workflows.

items.title: Operational Optimization
items.description: We optimize delivery routes, team planning, resource scheduling and workload distribution. Intelligent solutions that find the best way to increasing operational efficiency.

items.title: Intelligent Classification and Information Organization
items.description: Automatic organization of documents, emails, CVs or orders, directing or grouping according to context, theme or priority.

items.title: Structure and Normalization
items.description: Standardization of data and automatic extraction of relevant information from documents in multiple formats and sources, creating consistent databases ready for analysis.

SuccessCases.title: Success Cases
SuccessCases.subtitle: Real business transformations through successful partnerships with our team.

cases.title: Motorhome Rental Company
cases.subtitle: One-Way Fee Optimization
cases.description: This is a success story of a motorhome rental company, where we managed to optimize the fleet management process and consequently improve their operational results.

cases.title: Last-Mile Delivery Carrier
cases.subtitle: Route Planning
cases.description: Another success story with a carrier specialized in last-mile delivery, where we helped solve a very specific operational challenge.

cases.title: Ride-Hailing Company
cases.subtitle: Profitability Dashboard
cases.description: The story of how we helped a ride-hailing company solve a critical challenge related to profitability visibility.

TechMaturity.title: Technological Maturity
TechMaturity.subtitle: From data collection to automation: our path to innovation and digital transformation.

stages.title: Data
stages.subtitle: Sources, Collection and Storage
stages.description: In this phase, we focus on identifying and organizing relevant Data Sources for the business. These may include operational, financial, customer data, among others.

stages.title: Research
stages.subtitle: Analytics and Descriptive Statistics
stages.description: From this stage, we begin exploring the data we've collected. Through Analytics and Descriptive Statistics, we discover patterns and trends, helping us identify areas for improvement and optimization within the operation.

stages.title: Automation
stages.subtitle: Artificial Intelligence and Algorithms
stages.description: Through Artificial Intelligence, Algorithms, and Optimization, we ensure maximum results with minimum resources, guaranteeing operational efficiency and better results for our clients.

MissionValues.title: The Pillars that Define Us
MissionValues.subtitle: We build our identity on three fundamental pillars that guide all our actions and decisions.

pillars.title: 100% European
pillars.description: A Portuguese company, with Portuguese DNA, focused on the European market and the specific needs of European companies.
features: Deep knowledge of the European market
Technical support in multiple European languages

pillars.title: Agility
pillars.description: We adapt quickly to market changes and each client's specific needs.

pillars.title: Commitment to Results
pillars.description: Our clients' success is our success. We focus on delivering real and measurable value.

Recruitment.title: Want to work with us?
Recruitment.subtitle: We're looking for talents passionate about data and analytics who want to be part of an innovative team.
Recruitment.cultureDescription: We value creativity, collaboration, and continuous learning in all our teams.

benefits.title: Innovative Environment
benefits.description: Work with the latest technologies in data science and machine learning.

benefits.title: Continuous Development
benefits.description: We offer constant training and learning opportunities for your evolution.

benefits.title: Challenging Projects
benefits.description: Participate in challenging projects with real impact across various industries.

benefits.title: Exceptional Team
benefits.description: Join a diverse group of talented and passionate professionals.

Technologies.title: The technologies that enable us to deliver exceptional results
Technologies.subtitle: Cutting-edge technologies for exceptional results.

secure.title: Secure Solutions
secure.description: We guarantee the highest level of security for your data and applications.

performance.title: High Performance
performance.description: Optimized technologies to ensure speed and efficiency in analyses.

scalability.title: Scalability
scalability.description: Solutions that grow with your business, adapting to your needs.

CallToAction.title: Empower your business today
CallToAction.subtitle: Schedule a diagnostic consultation to discover how our data science services can transform your company

Footer.description: We transform data into strategic decisions, empowering our clients to operate with maximum efficiency.
